name: Starcrush (Linker)
description:
Fly through the stars and gather precious debris! What untold secrets await?

In Starcrush, you play as a ship which goes around levels, towing, blasting, and collecting debris to make money. This money then allows the player to unlock more levels, customize and upgrade their ship, and challenge themselves to get a high score on each level.

The game itself was made for the 2019 A Game By Its Cover gamejam over the course of the month of July.

The Famicase designs that inspired the game are Meteor Heat by Tyler Dori, and Deep Space Diver by Viet-Anh Cao. Please check them out and, if you'd like, support them on social media at @roguecache and @va_cao on Twitter respectively.
